body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/base.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b0514245d12f63f3f77ad2c88c0025fb64a0f174/pandas/core/base.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/frame/test_dtypes.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b0514245d12f63f3f77ad2c88c0025fb64a0f174/pandas/tests/frame/test_dtypes.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexing/test_indexing.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b0514245d12f63f3f77ad2c88c0025fb64a0f174/pandas/tests/indexing/test_indexing.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexing/test_multiindex.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b0514245d12f63f3f77ad2c88c0025fb64a0f174/pandas/tests/indexing/test_multiindex.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_dtypes.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b0514245d12f63f3f77ad2c88c0025fb64a0f174/pandas/tests/series/test_dtypes.py) !

> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/22785?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [739e6be...78dd81e](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/22785?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

With the caveats that a) I generally trust @TomAugspurger to know what he's doing and b) this can wait until the upcoming chat: wouldn't it be simpler just to allow EA to support 2D arrays?  I expect we're going to have to go that way eventually for #22614 etc

I'm still a bit hesitant about 2D extension arrays, since it pushes additional complexity on the implementations,  and goes a bit against our (someday?) goal of removing the BlockManager in favor of a simpler data structure. But I'll read through #22614 and related issues, and try to collect my thoughts.
I think everything has been addressed. Merging in a few hours.
I am fine with merging now, if that makes it easier for updating your sparse PR
